org.apache.flink.runtime.state

类 AbstractStateBackend

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.AbstractStateBackend
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, StateBackend
    直接已知子类:
    FsStateBackend, MemoryStateBackend, RocksDBStateBackend

    @PublicEvolving
public abstract class AbstractStateBackend
extends java.lang.Object
implements StateBackend, java.io.Serializable
    An abstract base implementation of the StateBackend interface.

    另请参阅:

      • createStreamFactory

        public abstract CheckpointStreamFactory createStreamFactory(JobID jobId,
                                                            java.lang.String operatorIdentifier)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: StateBackend
        Creates a CheckpointStreamFactory that can be used to create streams that should end up in a checkpoint.
        指定者:
        createStreamFactory 在接口中 StateBackend
        参数:
        jobId - The JobID of the job for which we are creating checkpoint streams.
        operatorIdentifier - An identifier of the operator for which we create streams.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • createSavepointStreamFactory

        public abstract CheckpointStreamFactory createSavepointStreamFactory(JobID jobId,
                                                                     java.lang.String operatorIdentifier,
                                                                     @Nullable
                                                                     java.lang.String targetLocation)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: StateBackend
        Creates a CheckpointStreamFactory that can be used to create streams that should end up in a savepoint.

        This is only called if the triggered checkpoint is a savepoint. Commonly this will return the same factory as for regular checkpoints, but maybe slightly adjusted.

        指定者:
        createSavepointStreamFactory 在接口中 StateBackend
        参数:
        jobId - The JobID of the job for which we are creating checkpoint streams.
        operatorIdentifier - An identifier of the operator for which we create streams.
        targetLocation - An optional custom location for the savepoint stream.
        返回:
        The stream factory for savepoints.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Failures during stream creation are forwarded.

      • createKeyedStateBackend

        public abstract <K> AbstractKeyedStateBackend<K> createKeyedStateBackend(Environment env,
                                                                         JobID jobID,
                                                                         java.lang.String operatorIdentifier,
                                                                         TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                                                                         int numberOfKeyGroups,
                                                                         KeyGroupRange keyGroupRange,
                                                                         TaskKvStateRegistry kvStateRegistry)
                                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: StateBackend
        Creates a new AbstractKeyedStateBackend that is responsible for holding keyed state and checkpointing it.

        Keyed State is state where each value is bound to a key.

        指定者:
        createKeyedStateBackend 在接口中 StateBackend
        类型参数:
        K - The type of the keys by which the state is organized.
        返回:
        The Keyed State Backend for the given job, operator, and key group range.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException

      • createOperatorStateBackend

        public abstract OperatorStateBackend createOperatorStateBackend(Environment env,
                                                                java.lang.String operatorIdentifier)
                                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: StateBackend
        Creates a new OperatorStateBackend that can be used for storing operator state.

        Operator state is state that is associated with parallel operator (or function) instances, rather than with keys.

        指定者:
        createOperatorStateBackend 在接口中 StateBackend
        参数:
        env - The runtime environment of the executing task.
        operatorIdentifier - The identifier of the operator whose state should be stored.
        返回:
        The OperatorStateBackend for operator identified by the job and operator identifier.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - This method may forward all exceptions that occur while instantiating the backend.

      • loadStateBackendFromConfig

        public static StateBackend loadStateBackendFromConfig(Configuration config,
                                                      java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                                      @Nullable
                                                      org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                               throws IllegalConfigurationException,
                                                      DynamicCodeLoadingException,
                                                      java.io.IOException
        Loads the state backend from the configuration, from the parameter 'state.backend', as defined in CoreOptions.STATE_BACKEND.

        The state backends can be specified either via their shortcut name, or via the class name of a StateBackendFactory. If a StateBackendFactory class name is specified, the factory is instantiated (via its zero-argument constructor) and its StateBackendFactory.createFromConfig(Configuration) method is called.

        Recognized shortcut names are '', '', and ''.

        参数:
        config - The configuration to load the state backend from
        classLoader - The class loader that should be used to load the state backend
        logger - Optionally, a logger to log actions to (may be null)
        返回:
        The instantiated state backend.
        抛出:
        DynamicCodeLoadingException - Thrown if a state backend factory is configured and the factory class was not found or the factory could not be instantiated
        IllegalConfigurationException - May be thrown by the StateBackendFactory when creating / configuring the state backend in the factory
        java.io.IOException - May be thrown by the StateBackendFactory when instantiating the state backend

      • loadStateBackendFromConfigOrCreateDefault

        public static StateBackend loadStateBackendFromConfigOrCreateDefault(Configuration config,
                                                                     java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                                                     @Nullable
                                                                     org.slf4j.Logger logger)
                                                              throws IllegalConfigurationException,
                                                                     DynamicCodeLoadingException,
                                                                     java.io.IOException
        Loads the state backend from the configuration, from the parameter 'state.backend', as defined in CoreOptions.STATE_BACKEND. If no state backend is configures, this instantiates the default state backend (the MemoryStateBackend).

        Refer to loadStateBackendFromConfig(Configuration, ClassLoader, Logger) for details on how the state backend is loaded from the configuration.

        参数:
        config - The configuration to load the state backend from
        classLoader - The class loader that should be used to load the state backend
        logger - Optionally, a logger to log actions to (may be null)
        返回:
        The instantiated state backend.
        抛出:
        DynamicCodeLoadingException - Thrown if a state backend factory is configured and the factory class was not found or the factory could not be instantiated
        IllegalConfigurationException - May be thrown by the StateBackendFactory when creating / configuring the state backend in the factory
        java.io.IOException - May be thrown by the StateBackendFactory when instantiating the state backend
